hero.heading: Hello, I'm Guilherme Nunes!
paragraphs: I'm a Full Stack Web Developer with 4 years of experience in software development, working with Delphi, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and MySQL.
I have solid experience with legacy code, system maintenance, bug fixing, and developing new features, as well as creating responsive and intuitive user interfaces.

What attracts me most to the tech field is problem-solving and the creative potential behind building applications. I'm always looking to improve my skills and stay focused and committed to delivering high-quality work.
In addition to application development, I'm also interested in learning more about Machine Learning and have a strong affinity for art and music, enjoying drawing and playing the piano as hobbies.
